cf.Data.min¶

Data.min(axes=None, squeeze=False, mtol=1, i=False, _preserve_partitions=False)[source]¶

Collapse axes with their minimum.

Missing data array elements are omitted from the calculation.

Parameters:

axes : (sequence of) int, optional

squeeze : bool, optional

i
: bool, optional

If True then update the data array in place. By default a new data array is created.
Returns:
out: cf.Data

The collapsed array.

See also

max, mean, mid_range, sum, sd, var

Examples:

Previous topic

cf.Data.max

Next topic

cf.Data.any
